source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT a.[ID],a.[FeedbackDate],a.[JobId],a.[UserId],a.[RequestRoleTypeID],a.[FeedbackRatingTypeID],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION FROM [Feedback].[Feedback] a
select r.JobID, r.GroupID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[JobAvailableToGroup] r
select r.JobID, r.QuestionID, r.Answer, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[JobQuestions] r

select r.ID,  r.RequestorType,r.OrganisationName
from [Request].[Request] r 
where RequestorType is not null or OrganisationName is not null
select r.RequestId, r.ActivityID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[SupportActivities] r

sqlReaderQuery.value: select CT.ID, a.[PostcodeId], a.[AddressLine1],a.[AddressLine2], a.[AddressLine3],a.[Locality],a.[LastUpdated] , CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Address].[AddressDetail] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Address].[AddressDetail], @{activity('Last_AddressDetail').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('CurrentChange_AddressDetail').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

source.query: SELECT top 1 c.MaxTS FROM c order by c._ts desc

query.value: SELECT top 1 c._ts FROM c where c._ts>@{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.MaxTS} order by c._ts desc

SELECT IS_DEFINED(c.RecipientUserID) ? c.RecipientUserID : c.RecipientUserId AS RecipientUserID, c.MessageId, c.GroupId, c.JobId, c.TemplateName,c.event,udf.convertTime(c._ts) as EventTime, IS_DEFINED(c.RequestId) ? c.RequestId : -1 as RequestId FROM c where c.TemplateName<>null and 
c.event<>null

sqlReaderQuery.value: select CT.ID, a.[FeedbackDate], a.[JobId],a.[UserId], a.[RequestRoleTypeID],a.[FeedbackRatingTypeID], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Feedback].[Feedback] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Feedback].[Feedback], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[Question] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[Question], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[QuestionType] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[QuestionType], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RegistrationFormVariant] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[RegistrationFormVariant], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestFormStage] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[RequestFormStage], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestHelpFormVariant] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[RequestHelpFormVariant], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestType] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[RequestType], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[Role] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[Role], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[SupportActivity] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[SupportActivity], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[SupportActivityInstructions] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[SupportActivityInstructions], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[TargetGroup] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[TargetGroup], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.JobID, CT.GroupID, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[JobAvailableToGroup] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Request].[JobAvailableToGroup], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.JobID = CT.JobID and r.GroupID = CT.GroupID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.JobID, CT.QuestionID, r.Answer, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[JobQuestions] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Request].[JobQuestions], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.JobID = CT.JobID and r.QuestionID = CT.QuestionID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ActivityID, CT.QuestionID, CT.RequestFormVariantID, r.[Order], r.[Required], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [QuestionSet].[ActivityQuestions] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [QuestionSet].[ActivityQuestions], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.ActivityID = CT.ActivityID and r.QuestionID = CT.QuestionID  and r.RequestFormVariantID = CT.RequestFormVariantID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, r.[Name],r.QuestionType,r.AdditionalData , CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [QuestionSet].[Question] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [QuestionSet].[Question], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.ID = CT.ID  where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.requestId, r.ActivityID, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[SupportActivities] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Request].[SupportActivities], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.RequestID = CT.RequestID and r.ActivityID = CT.ActivityID 
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, u.FirebaseUID, u.PostalCode, u.EmailSharingConsent, u.MobileSharingConsent, u.OtherPhoneSharingConsent, u.HMSContactConsent, u.IsVolunteer, u.IsVerified, u.DateCreated, u.StreetChampionRoleUnderstood, u.SupportVolunteersByPhone, u.SupportRadiusMiles, u.ReferringGroupId,u.Source, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [User].[User] u RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [User].[User], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on u.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

source.query: SELECT top 1 c.MaxTS FROM c order by c._ts desc

query.value:
SELECT c.datestamp, c.userId, c.rememberMeId, c.verified, c.verificationDetails.dobMatch, c.verificationDetails.ageMatch, c.verificationDetails.notPreviouslyVerified,c.userUpdated 
from c where c._ts>@{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.MaxTS}
SELECT top 1 c._ts FROM c where c._ts>@{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.MaxTS} order by c._ts desc

SELECT c.datestamp, c.userId, c.rememberMeId, c.verified, c.verificationDetails.dobMatch, c.verificationDetails.ageMatch, c.verificationDetails.notPreviouslyVerified,c.userUpdated 
from c 
where c._ts>1589372085
